profile.name: VictoriaMetrics
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Time Series Data Expert | Based on the provided information, I would recommend VictoriaMetrics as a developer at: Okta This
profile.summary: Highly motivated and experienced software engineer with a strong passion for time series data, monitoring, and logging. Proficient in Python, Rust, Go, TypeScript, and Makefile. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed a standalone PromQL and MetricsQL parser in Go, enabling efficient querying of time series data.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects related to time series data, monitoring, and logging.
Developed a Kubernetes operator for VictoriaMetrics using Go.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
